description: The Peacock Plant (Calathea makoyana) is an amazing plant with unique foliage. Its striking leaves boast a bright green color on the surface and deep purple color on the underside. These attractive leaves grow in an interesting fan shape, possessing the look of a peacock's grand display of feathers. Plus, as the plant's leaves mature and expand they form a unique 'stair' pattern, giving the plant a special visual appeal. Moreover, the plant repels pests such insects, and many have said that it fills the room with a pleasant fragrance. To top it all off, the Peacock Plant is incredibly easy to care for and is a great choice for any houseplant enthusiast.
